Shivah::

"We'll see" replied the male "the Leader could be busy with a 
meeting; if he can't meet you, Perceptor, the second in rank could 
be... Maybe she can tell us..." said the male while Blacknightmare 
appeared "Hey Blacknightmare, can Darkfate recive us???? He's Ender 
and he wants join us..."

"Darkfate is in a meeting with Killfest and Drill bit..." replied the 
femme "But Perceptor could come..." she opened her comm 
link "Perceptor, do you copy?"

"I can hear you, Blacknightmare" replied the male.

"Shivah found a new ally..." said the femme.

"Lead him to my office..." answered the male "I'll be there in a 
nano, Perceptor out"

"Well" said Shivah "We have to go a meeting to... Do you follow us 
Blacknightmare?"

"Darkfate gave me duties... I'm afraid I can't. Excuse me" said the 
femme and she dissappear in a corritor.

Shiva said "Well, let's go then..."

And the male leaded Ender to Perceptor's office.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "As you command."  He follows Shivah down the hall to wherever 
they were 
> going.  "Who exactly am I going to be meeting with?"
